p: Another relevant HEV animal reservoir is wild boars, and increasing cases of human HEV infection due to the consumption of infected wild boar meat have been reported in Asia and Europe in recent years [ 3, 39]. Nevertheless, the reported prevalence in wild boar is mostly lower than that in pigs [ 3, 9, 40, 41, 42]. Wild boars may play an important role in the epidemiology of HEV in swine populations since transmission from wild boars to domestic pigs has been experimentally demonstrated [ 43].
